title: Restore clickable path in search results and update to v0.4.121

requirements.text: Add clickable path/location information to each search result row in the FileList component, allowing users to navigate to the folder containing each found file

quotes: restore the clickable path for search results

acceptanceCriteria: Each search result displays the folder path where the file is located
The path is clickable and navigates to the containing folder
Path display is clearly visible in the search results view

requirements.text: Update the app version constant in frontend/src/lib/appVersion.ts to '0.4.121'

constraints: Do not modify any other functionality, styling, or behavior beyond the specified requirements
nonGoals: Changing design or layout beyond adding the clickable path
Altering other UI components or features
